title: Chimerik — Improvised performance (Unity Consciousness Festival)
summary: Music and dance were once the same thing.
description: How can we use digital instruments to turn dancers into musicians and musicians into dancers? Liliana Salazar and I created an improvised performance at the Roundhouse in Vancouver.

summary: Wireless, battery-powered setup in the wilderness of BC.
